```{r}
library(RAPS)
```


# Small stochastic P system
```{r}
my_rap = path2rap(demo = 1)
RAPS::show_rap(my_rap)
```

Now the simulation:
```{r}
my_rap %>%
  RAPS::alg_det_menv(max_T = 1e-4, verbose = TRUE, debug = TRUE)
```


# FAS
```{r}
fas_rap = RAPS::load_demo_dataset("FAS")
fas_rap
```

```{r}
fas_rap %>%
  RAPS::alg_det_menv(max_T = 1e-4, verbose = TRUE, debug = FALSE)
```
